title: 12/24/20 – HOUR 3 – The Steelers Are Who We Thought They Were!
itunes:title: 12/24/20 – HOUR 3 – The Steelers Are Who We Thought They Were!
description:
With Rob Parker and T.J. Houshmandzadeh in for Dan Patrick, the guys question if the Pittsburgh Steelers are talented enough to right the ship after a suffering injuries to key positions and the sudden drop-off of Big Ben Roethlisberger. They speak with Eric Pincus of Bleacher Report about the early start to the NBA season and all of the hottest headlines around the Association. Finally, the guys give their best

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
